categories: Category:Wizards of the Coast Expanded Universe articles

nodes.text: "Tru Veld, Jedi Padawan" is a web enhancement written by Cory J. Herndon and released by Wizards of the Coast on September 5, 2002 as a companion to Jedi Quest: The Way of the Apprentice. It provides a short biography and Star Wars Roleplaying Game stats for Tru Veld.
